column4: is there any way I could load an ISO image into the cdrom without burning a CD, or is there some software to open the image file and execute its content?
you can mount iso imatge files easially enough
or you may want to try the fuseiso tools.
you can go to  the alt-ctrl-f2 and f3 consoles i belive.
